game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient amulet from the depths of the Forbidden Temple.
game.description:
Legend has it that an ancient amulet with unimaginable power lies hidden deep within the Forbidden Temple.
		Many have tried to find it but none have succeeded. Are you brave enough to take up this quest and
		venture into the treacherous temple? The fate of the world may rest in your hands!

task.description:
The Forbidden Temple is sealed off from the outside world. To gain entry, you must find the
				Temple Key. It is said to be hidden somewhere in the Enchanted Forest. Search for clues and
				beware of the magical creatures that inhabit the forest!

Once you have obtained the Temple Key, make your way to the entrance of the Forbidden Temple.
				The temple is known for its complex chambers filled with traps and puzzles. Use your wit and
				skills to navigate through the treacherous paths and reach the inner sanctum.

As you approach the inner sanctum, a fearsome Guardian Beast stands in your way. This creature
				is fiercely protective of the amulet and will not let anyone pass without a fight. Prepare yourself
				for a challenging battle against the Guardian Beast and prove your worth to claim the amulet.
